page.title: 13CULLOMPTON PLAY GROUPS
page.content: There are 2 groups,both hope to prepare children for school.All should get used to being without mums,going to the toilet on their own,playing with other children and holding a pencil. One play group,open for 8 years has 72 children;24 go at a time.There are 4 helpers.Favourite activities there were Wendy House,play dough,puzzles etc.The other open for 17 years,has 108 children,24 to a session and 5 helpers.Favourite activities there were Wendy House,sand pit and climbing frame.They went mornings or afternoons. As well as free activity they have circle time.We saw a lady teaching them the road safety Green Cross Code. They visit the infant school.
